full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYUD SDE SPYI'I RNAM PAR BZHAG PA SKAL BZANG GI YID 'PHROG CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @062B (CES RGYUD SDE SPYI'I RNAM PAR BZHAG PA SKAL BZANG YID 'PHROG CES BYA BA 'DI NI, RGYUD PA YAB SRAS KYI GSUNG SGROS RNYING PA GZHIR BZHAG PA LA KHA 'THOR BA RNAMS PHYOGS GCIG TU BSGRIGS PA DANG, BDED KYIS DUS 'KHOR GSUM GYI tI KA CHEN DANG, SNGAGS RIM CHEN MO RNAMS KYIS CUNG ZAD SPROS TE BRGYAN PAR BYAS NAS, MANG THOS CHOS KYI SPYAN CAN RDO RJE'I SLOB DPON CHOS LDAN BLO GROS PA'I ZHAL SNGA NAS KYI GSUNG LAS SKYES PA'I BTZUN PA BSOD NAMS MING CAN GYIS DBEN GNAS BYAMS PA GLING DU @063A *, ,BSGRIGS PA'O,, ,,AOm SVA STI, RIGS BRGYA'I KHYAB BDG STON PA RDO RJE 'CHANG, RIGS GSUM SPYI BSDUS 'JAM MGON TZONG KHA PA, ,RIGS GNAS KUN MKHYEN PA PAn CHEN BSOD NAMS GRAGS, ,RNAM GSUM DPYOD MED ZHABS LA GUS PAS 'DUD, ,RDO RJE 'CHANG DBAN GZHAL GYI BUM BZANG LAS, ,LEGS 'ONGS GSANG CHEN RGYUD SDE RGYA MTSO'I DON, ,DPAL MGON KLU SGRUB YAB SRAS MAN NGAG BZHIN, ,GSAL BYED BSAM 'PHEL DBANG RGYAL 'DI RMAD DO, ,DE SLAD BSTAN PA'I SNYING PO SNGAGS KYI SPYOD, ,RNAL MA SRID MTHA'I BAR DU GNAS PA DANG, ,RIS MED 'GRO LA GTAN MED MCHOD SBYIN RGYUR, ,DMIGS TE PAR GYI 'PHRUL 'DEGS DENG 'DIR BSGRUBS, ,'DIR 'BAD LAS BYUNG RNAM DKAR ZLA GSAR 'DIS, ,RGYAL BSTAN SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR TSONG KHA PA'I, ,MDO SNGAGS BSTAN PHYOGS BCUR RGYAS PA DANG, 'GRO KUN YID KYI MUN PA SEL BAR SHOG , ,,'BREL THOGS KUN KYANG TSE RABS 'PHRENG BA RU, ,BSHES GNYEN DAM PAS RJES BZUNG GSANG CHEN LAM, MNGON DU 'GYUR TE 'GRO BA SGROL PA LA, DPAL LDAN RDO RJE CAN DANG MTSUNGS PAR SHOG , ,,BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED RGYAL KHANG RTZE MCHOG SPRUL RIN PO CHES PAR DU BSGRUBS TE KUN DGA' CHOS GLING DU BZHUGS DGE'O, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
